about.content: I am Yahya Kayani, a Software Developer. I have a keen interest in Web Development, Machine Learning, and Cloud Services. I have been exploring advanced technologies and refining my skills through practical experience at Dalhousie University as a Research Assistant. I enjoy building projects, sharing my learnings in tech, and writing about topics like cloud computing and networking protocols. Additionally, I started Our Tech Community (OTC) four years ago, where we regularly conduct events for tech enthusiasts to learn and grow together. In my leisure time, I love reading books, listening to music, watching educational content on YouTube, and Bird Watching. Feel free to get in touch with me!

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React and GitHub Pages to showcase my projects and skills.

projects.title: E-commerce App
projects.description: Built a mobile e-commerce application with real-time database integration using Firebase, allowing users to browse and purchase products.

projects.title: Heartbeat CRM Tool
projects.description: Led the development of a CRM tool, improving workflows and communication processes using AWS for cloud storage and RabbitMQ for messaging.

responsibilities: Assisting in research projects focused on enhancing reading education through personalized NLP and ML-powered systems.
Collaborating with faculty on data analysis, experiment design, and presentation of research findings.
Enhanced database performance by optimizing relational databases and implementing efficient queries, reducing application breakdowns by 15%.
Developed API microservices in Node.js and Python, increasing system efficiency by 20%.
Led full-stack development using React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, improving system scalability and performance.

hackathons.title: Blue Hackathon
hackathons.description: Developed a solution for ocean sustainability and ghost gear management, using IoT and cloud services.

hackathons.title: MLH Global Hackathon
hackathons.description: Collaborated on building an AI-based learning tool for children.

researchPapers.title: DeBERTa Model Optimization for Long-Form Text Annotation
researchPapers.description: Engaged in a collaborative project to develop an automated text annotator for long-form text, utilizing the DeBERTa model for deep learning tasks.
